skill.name: agent.skills.ReconnoiterThenBuild
skill.description: For the agent, to reconnoiter each issued planned works (the locations of the planned work) and then construct it. The agent moves to first work, reconnoiters its position the then build it. Once it is done, it moves to next one until the last is reached.

parameter.name: works
parameter.description: The set of planned works to reconnoiter and build.

link.name: reconnoiter
link.description: To enact the decision of reconnoitering the planned work location.

link.name: build
link.description: To enact the decision to build the planned work.
